title: Victoria Beckham's London Fashion Week show was a family affair
text:
Victoria Beckham presented her spring/summer 2020 collection during London Fashion Week on Sunday.

The designer's family, including her husband David, 44, and their four children, Brooklyn, 20, Romeo, 17, Cruz, 14, and Harper, 8, was in attendance to support.

The group took over the front row at the show, along with fashion insiders Anna Wintour, British Vogue editor-in-chief Edward Enninful and Vogue Paris' editor-in-chief Emmanuelle Alt.

David shared a selfie with the kids from the show.

"A lot of love for mummy this afternoon .. Well done @victoriabeckham we are so proud as always," he captioned the photo.

Harper seemed to have a great time at the event, with Victoria describing her daughter as "my number one guest!!!"

Beckham also shared some photos of Harper posing backstage with models who walked in the show, including South Sudanese-Australian top model Adut Akech.

Harper even got a photo with Wintour.

Now that's some good family time.
description: The designer's family, including her husband David, 44, and their four children, Brooklyn, 20, Romeo, 17, Cruz, 14, and Harper, 8, was in attendance to support.
